artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of two figures on the left hovering around a fire on a two-tier pedestal engraved in black and white; in the center are two women shown from the waist up in elaborate hats; on the right is a woman holding a pink fan in a pink and white gown with green trim and a green sash around her waist and in a whitish/brown hat with pink and green detailing and pink plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Dix-septième Cahier, 11 Mai 1789
